com.teamviewer.sdk.screensharing.api

Class TVDebugTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamviewer.sdk.screensharing.api.TVDebugTools

  • public final class TVDebugTools
extends Object
    Utility class for collecting log files or sending these to the TeamViewer support.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean collectLogfiles(String targetZip)
      Collect logfiles and package them in a zip file.
      static TVDebugTools createInstance(Context context)
      Returns an instance of the TVDebugTools.
      void sendReport()
      Triggers an e-mail intent to TeamViewer support with attached log files.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createInstance

        public static TVDebugTools createInstance(Context context)
        Returns an instance of the TVDebugTools.
        Parameters:
        context - Activity or Application context.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the given context is null.

      • sendReport

        public void sendReport()
                throws ActivityNotFoundException
        Triggers an e-mail intent to TeamViewer support with attached log files.
        Throws:
        ActivityNotFoundException - If no matching activity for handling the e-mail intent was found.

      • collectLogfiles

        public boolean collectLogfiles(String targetZip)
        Collect logfiles and package them in a zip file. This zipfile is placed in the TeamViewer folder of the external storage
        Parameters:
        targetZip - Name of the zip archive to be created. Must be a valid filename
        Returns:
        true if zip archive was created. Note: may not contain any logfiles
